translation.announcement_tag: Announcing our next round of funding
translation.use_our_neural_network: Our Mission is to empower businesses with advanced data-driven solutions and cutting-edge technology that enable them to thrive in the digital age.
translation.feature_1_description: Eliminates the need to install and maintain software on individual computers. Allows for easy access and updates from any location with an internet connection.
translation.feature_2_description: No need for human operator intervention, which enables high precision, speed, and consistency in production. Also reduced labor costs and increased efficiency.
translation.feature_3_description: Maximize the useful life of a cutting tool, improving the efficiency and productivity of the manufacturing process, as well as reduce tooling costs and downtime.
translation.reliable_solution_for_inspection_descrip: The best way to know when it’s time for a new cutting tool is by using the latest in computer vision technology.
translation.excepteur_sint_occaecat_cupidatat_non_pr: Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est.
translation.lorem_ipsum_dolor_sit_amet: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
translation.your_browser_does_not_support_the_video_: Your browser does not support the video tag.
translation.it_only_takes_a_few_minutes_to_start_wit: It only takes a few minutes to start with Tool Detective. Schedule a meeting and understand your needs.
